title.text: Proceedings of The 10th International Natural Language Generation conference

abstractContent.text: This talk will present a few NLG systems developed within Thomson Reuters providing information to professionals such as lawyers, accountants or traders.
Based on the experience developing these system, I will discuss the usefulness of automatic metrics, crowd-sourced evaluation, corpora studies and expert reviews.
I will conclude with exploring the question of whether developers of NLG systems need to follow ethical guidelines and how those guidelines could be established.
